mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX , A.TYPE , A.NAME , A.ALL_TYPE_NAME , CONCAT(A.TIME1, ' ', A.TIME2, ', ', A.TIME3, ' ', A.TIME4) AS TIME , A.TIME5 AS FIRST_SUBJECT , A.TIME6 AS SECOND_SUBJECT , A.SUBJECTS , A.GRADES , A.INPUT_NAME , IFNULL(A.ETC, " ") AS ETC , CONCAT(A.CNT - (SELECT COUNT(IDX) FROM MY_LECTURE WHERE LECTURE_NO1=A.TIME5 AND SUBJECTS=A.SUBJECTS AND SUBJECTS=A.SUBJECTS AND STATUS='Y')) AS CNT , A.INPUT_ID FROM (SELECT NAME , S.TYPE , S.ALL_TYPE_NAME , (CASE WHEN S.TIME1 IN('1','2','3','4','5', '6', '7', '8') THEN '월요일' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('9','10','11','12','13', '14', '15', '16') THEN '화요일' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('17','18','19','20','21', '22', '23', '24') THEN '수요일' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('25','26','27','28','29', '30', '31', '32') THEN '목요일' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('33','34','35','36','37', '38', '39', '40') THEN '금요일' END) AS TIME1 , (CASE WHEN S.TIME1 IN('1','9','17','25','33') THEN '1교시' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('2','10','18','26','34') THEN '2교시' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('3','11','19','27','35') THEN '3교시' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('4','12','20','28','36') THEN '4교시' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('5','13','21','29','37') THEN '5교시' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('6','14','22','30','38') THEN '6교시' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('7','15','23','31','39') THEN '7교시' WHEN S.TIME1 IN('8','16','24','32','40') THEN '8교시' END) AS TIME2 , (CASE WHEN S.TIME2 IN('1','2','3','4','5', '6', '7', '8') THEN '월요일' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('9','10','11','12','13', '14', '15', '16') THEN '화요일' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('17','18','19','20','21', '22', '23', '24') THEN '수요일' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('25','26','27','28','29', '30', '31', '32') THEN '목요일' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('33','34','35','36','37', '38', '39', '40') THEN '금요일' END) AS TIME3 , (CASE WHEN S.TIME2 IN('1','9','17','25','33') THEN '1교시' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('2','10','18','26','34') THEN '2교시' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('3','11','19','27','35') THEN '3교시' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('4','12','20','28','36') THEN '4교시' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('5','13','21','29','37') THEN '5교시' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('6','14','22','30','38') THEN '6교시' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('7','15','23','31','39') THEN '7교시' WHEN S.TIME2 IN('8','16','24','32','40') THEN '8교시' END) AS TIME4 , S.TIME1 AS TIME5 , S.TIME2 AS TIME6 , S.GRADES , (SELECT INPUT_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE INPUT_ID = #{inputId }) AS INPUT_NAME , S.ETC , S.CNT , S.INPUT_ID , S.IDX , S.SUBJECTS FROM LECTURE S) A WHERE A.INPUT_ID = #{inputId } AND A.TYPE = #{type }
SELECT SUBJECTS , TIME1 , TIME2 , GRADES , ALL_TYPE_NAME FROM LECTURE WHERE TIME1 = #{idx1 } AND TIME2 = #{idx2 }

SELECT A.SUBJECTS , A.USER_ID , A.STATUS , A.LECTURE_NO1 AS FIRST_SUBJECT , A.LECTURE_NO2 AS SECOND_SUBJECT , A.GRADES , A.ALL_TYPE_NAME , B.NAME FROM MY_LECTURE A JOIN LECTURE B ON A.SUBJECTS=B.VALUE AND A.LECTURE_NO1=B.TIME1 WHERE A.USER_ID = #{value } AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(IDX) FROM MY_LECTURE WHERE USER_ID = #{inputId } AND LECTURE_NO1 IN (#{idx1 }, #{idx2 }) OR LECTURE_NO2 IN (#{idx1 }, #{idx2 }) AND STATUS = 'Y'
